title: Simple Tomato Spaghetti
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 5 minutes
Cook time: 15 minutes

Ingredients:
- 160 g dried spaghetti
- 2 tbsp olive oil (30 ml)
- 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
- 400 g canned crushed tomatoes
- 1/2 tsp salt (3 g)
- 1/4 tsp black pepper (1 g)
- 6 fresh basil leaves, torn
- 20 g grated Parmesan (optional)

Instructions:
1. Bring 1.5 liters of water to a boil and cook spaghetti for 8–10 minutes.
2. Heat olive oil and cook garlic for 30–40 seconds.
3. Add tomatoes, salt, and pepper and simmer for 8 minutes.
4. Combine pasta with sauce and serve.

title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 10 minutes
Cook time: 20 minutes

Ingredients:
- 160 g short pasta
- 200 g mushrooms
- 150 ml cream
- 20 g butter

Instructions:
1. Cook pasta until al dente.
2. Cook mushrooms in butter.
3. Add cream and simmer.
4. Combine with pasta.

title: Garlic Butter Chicken Thighs
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 10 minutes
Cook time: 25 minutes

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken thighs
- 20 g butter
- 3 cloves garlic

Instructions:
1. Sear chicken skin-side down.
2. Flip and cook until internal temp reaches 75°C.
3. Add butter and garlic and baste.

title: Lemon Herb Baked Salmon
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 5 minutes
Cook time: 15 minutes

Ingredients:
- 2 salmon fillets
- lemon juice
- herbs

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C.
2. Season salmon.
3. Bake 12–15 minutes.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Rice
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 10 minutes
Cook time: 15 minutes

Ingredients:
- mixed vegetables
- soy sauce
- rice

Instructions:
1. Stir-fry vegetables.
2. Add sauce.
3. Serve with rice.

title: Quick Beef Chili
content:
Serves: 3
Prep time: 10 minutes
Cook time: 30 minutes

Ingredients:
- ground beef
- beans
- tomatoes

Instructions:
1. Brown beef.
2. Add spices and tomatoes.
3. Simmer 20 minutes.

title: Overnight Oats with Berries
content:
Serves: 1
Prep time: 5 minutes
Chill time: 6 hours

Ingredients:
- oats
- milk
- yogurt
- berries

Instructions:
1. Mix ingredients.
2. Chill overnight.

title: Chocolate Mug Cake
content:

Instructions:
1. Mix ingredients.
2. Microwave 45–60 seconds.

Instructions:
1. Mix batter.
2. Cook pancakes 2–3 minutes per side.

title: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Pasta
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 10 minutes
Cook time: 20 minutes

Ingredients:
- 160 g pasta
- 20 g butter
- 3 cloves garlic
- 150 ml cream
- 30 g Parmesan

Instructions:
1. Cook pasta until al dente.
2. Melt butter and cook garlic for 30 seconds.
3. Add cream and simmer 4 minutes.
4. Combine with pasta and Parmesan.

title: Tomato Penne with Garlic
content:
Serves: 2
Prep time: 5 minutes

Ingredients:
- 160 g penne
- 2 tbsp olive oil

Instructions:
1. Cook penne until al dente.
2. Cook garlic in olive oil.
3. Add tomatoes and simmer 8 minutes.
4. Combine with pasta.

title: Butter and Black Pepper Spaghetti
content:
